channel.title: Customs in 508's
channel.description:
is it possible.. (obviously its possible, but is there a way that can make it as easy as like 317custom models)
i was playing this 508 ps and i saw items from 613 and i looked in the client files and there was a folder called models blah blah blah just like 317s
so iwas wondering if i could just make a models folder and begin making my models for something not so shitty as 317

item.title: Customs in 508's
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

download a client that supports customs and use same models, just in .dat form. Simple. Or google it…

Read full topic

item.title: Customs in 508's
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Timberpig., post:1, topic:360133”]is it possible… (obviously its possible, but is there a way that can make it as easy as like 317custom models)

i was playing this 508 ps and i saw items from 613 and i looked in the client files and there was a folder called models
blah blah blah
just like 317s

so iwas wondering if i could just make a models folder and begin making my models for something not so shitty as 317[/quote]

Just decompile the client, and rip the code which loads models.

It shouldn’t be too hard.

Read full topic
